name: drying of maize grain | drying of maize grain | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21461/documentation

The functional unit is one liter of water evaporated. This module should be used when evaluating drying of maize grain in an Easel Dryer.;The drying capacity corresponds to the reduction of moisture up to 4% in the Brazilian conditions when is found around 60% of moisture in air. Drying capacity is 80 tonnes of maize grains dried per hour.;Figure 1. Illustration of an Easel Dryer.

From grains cleaned and wet inside silo.

This activity ends with dried grains inside the silo before being storage. 
The dataset is a service dataset. It includes the energy demand (supplied by consumption of electricity and firewood) for evaporating 1 liter of water. The data for energy demand are based on the drying at silo, in an Easel Dryer, of maize from 18% to 14% of moisture content. Also included in the inventory is the air emissions from firewood combustion at furnace, infrastructure (building and machinery) and land use. The whole process inside silo covers the reception, cleaning, drying and storage of maize grains. However, in this dataset just drying burdens are corvered. The dataset does not include waste and air emissions (like dust). Grain input, production of the wet educt and utilisation of the dried product are not included as well.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0163:Post-harvest crop activities

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time period of the most of the data collected for this dataset.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Data are based on smale scale of drying. Drying at silo, in Easel dryer, of grains like maize. Evaporation capacity is 80 tonnes.hour-1 of dried maize grain.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Lifetime of machinery and building.Emission profile (except CO2, NOx and SOx) was based on ecoinvent database. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The main source of data are projects conducted by Embrapa Milho e Sorgo (CNPMS) and Embrapa Soja (CNPSO). Data are also provided by relevant experts related to maize sector in Brazil.

exchanges.description:
The functional unit is one liter of water evaporated.This dataset is a service dataset. Grain input and utilisation of the dried product are not included.
The grain input and the evaporated water and dried grain outputs need to be added in the dataset which is using this service.

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
The total weight of the machines (3 tonnes for grain-drying equipments) was taked into account as cast iron. The total weight of the machinery, balanced as cast iron per liter of water evaporated, was calculated dividing the total weight by the annual yield of dried product, the water evaporated per kilogram of dried product and the lifetime of the infrastructure. The expected useful life of the machinery was extrapolated from "drying of maize grain, GLO" dataset, being 25 years. Construction and maintenance processes for the machinery were not included. Data from May et al. (2016).
